picks.title: Picks for iPhone
picks.desc: Find your best photos and get rid of the rest. Top 10 at PennApps W15 hackathon. Pic by Trevor Phillippi. Coming soon to the App Store.

droughtio.title: Drought.io
droughtio.desc: Interactive visualization of drought, rainfall patterns, and US agriculture. Angular.js app released under MIT License with Altan Gulen.

rpiehc.title: RPI EHC
rpiehc.desc: I did some talks and organized a few events while President of the Embedded Hardware Club at Rensselaer Polytechnic Institute.
